sys_script_include.name: TimeSlotGenerator

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a47c8aba1bb9e950dd39ed3abc4bcbbb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_980836_car.TimeSlotGenerator</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TimeSlotGenerator</name><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: TimeSlotGenerator
var TimeSlotGenerator = Class.create();
TimeSlotGenerator.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {
    this.timeSlots = [];
    this.intervalInMinutes = 15;
    this.start = 480; // start time in minutes (8am)
    this.end = 1080; // end time in minutes (6pm)
  },

  generateTimeSlots: function() {
    var timeSlot = this.start;

    while (timeSlot <= this.end) {
      var hour = Math.floor(timeSlot / 60);
      var minute = timeSlot % 60;
      var amPm = hour < 12 ? 'AM' : 'PM';
      hour = hour % 12 || 12;

      var label = hour + ':' + (minute < 10 ? '0' + minute : minute) + ' ' + amPm;
      this.timeSlots.push(label);

      timeSlot += this.intervalInMinutes;
    }

    return this.timeSlots;
  }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-29 11:12:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>a47c8aba1bb9e950dd39ed3abc4bcbbb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TimeSlotGenerator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car" source="x_980836_car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a47c8aba1bb9e950dd39ed3abc4bcbbb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-29 11:31:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
